author: Sundaresh Menon CJ (delivering the judgment of the court ex tempore):
casenumber: Court of Appeal — Civil Appeal No 167 of 2019
casename: Rex International Holding Ltd and another v Gulf Hibiscus Ltd
coram: Sundaresh Menon CJ, Steven Chong JA and Woo Bih Li J
counsel: Jaikanth Shankar, Tan Ruo Yu, Darren Low, Yee Guang Yi and Terence De Silva (Davinder Singh Chambers LLC) for the first and second appellants;Jason Chan, Leong Yi-Ming (Allen & Gledhill LLP) (instructed counsel), Tito Issac and Hariz Lee (Tito Issac & Co LLP) for the respondent.
